programme.title: Kuwait on the map
programme.short_synopsis: The notoriety of Kuwait, Riyadh and Baghdad due to the Gulf War and beyond.
programme.medium_synopsis: Kuwait, Riyadh and Baghdad are now known all over America. Alistair Cooke reflects on how war has added new locations to the public conscience.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
